key_talking_points: The Florida Panthers are holding a one-goal lead over the Edmonton Oilers early in the first period.
Edmonton was just penalized for holding-the-stick at 2:54. We'll see if Florida can capitalize.
Florida's player #8476454 was assessed a tripping penalty at 3:32. Edmonton will now go on the power play.
Both teams are generating shots on goal, indicating an open and fast-paced start to the game.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game is relatively active with shots and penalties, but not at a frantic pace. Mixed coverage will allow for both play-by-play and analysis.

game_context.game_situation: FLA leading EDM by 1 goal in the 1st period.
